import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import '../styles/tour.css' import ComonSection from '../shared/ComonSection' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import TourCard from '../shared/TourCard' import SearchBar from '../shared/SearchBar' import Newsletter from '../shared/Newsletter' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap' const Tours = () => { const [pageCount, setPageCount] = useState(0) const [page, setPage] = useState(0) useEffect(() => { const pages = Math.ceil(5/4) // use backend data setPageCount(pages) },[page]) return ( <>
{ tourData?.map(tour => ( )) }
{[...Array(pageCount).keys()].map(number =>( {number + 1} ))}
) } export default Tours
